name: Fantasy Universe
description: Magical worlds with mythical creatures, enchanted environments, and supernatural elements

prompt.base: Fantasy universe, magical world, mythical setting, enchanted environment, supernatural elements, fantasy realm, mystical atmosphere
prompt.positive: fantasy universe, magical world, mythical creatures, enchanted environment, supernatural elements, fantasy realm, mystical atmosphere, magical lighting, ethereal effects, legendary setting, epic scale
prompt.negative: modern technology, contemporary setting, realistic physics, mundane environment, ordinary world, scientific approach

technical.world_constraints: Bound by magical rules and lore

variations.name: High Fantasy
variations.modifier: epic scale, grand kingdoms, legendary heroes, world-changing magic, mythical beasts

variations.name: Dark Fantasy
variations.modifier: gothic atmosphere, dark magic, grim setting, horror elements, ominous tone

variations.name: Urban Fantasy
variations.modifier: modern city with magic, hidden magical world, contemporary fantasy, secret societies

examples: An enchanted forest in fantasy universe, magical creatures, mystical atmosphere, ethereal lighting
A grand castle in fantasy realm, legendary setting, epic scale, magical environment
